sentences.english: Fancy hotels are beginning to accommodate both man and pets.
sentences.chinese: 一些別出心裁的飯店已經開始同時留宿人和寵物。

sentences.english: This unique gift will make them unforgetable.
sentences.chinese: 這種別出心裁的“紀念禮物”，將會讓他們終身難忘。

sentences.english: Time is the most merciless to small pattern different from the usual pattern.
sentences.chinese: 時間對於別出心裁的小花樣是最無情的。

sentences.english: There are endless combinations possible with “Misfits.”
sentences.chinese: “別出心裁”沙發有無窮的組合。
